direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods build a DeferredChanged object but with different functionalities. 'build' constructs a list of deferred values, while 'buildIsChanged' checks if a change has occurred and constructs a DeferredChanged based on that.
Both methods manipulate the deferredValues list, with 'add' adding a single DeferredChanged item and 'build' processing the entire list to construct a DeferredChanged object.
Both methods manipulate the deferredValues list, with 'addAll' adding multiple DeferredChanged items and 'build' processing the entire list to construct a DeferredChanged object.
Both methods interact with the whenSet list, with 'whenSet' adding a consumer to the list and 'build' iterating over this list to set values in the DeferredChanged object.
Both methods log information about the deferred values, with 'logValue' providing a utility for logging and 'build' using this utility to log the collected deferred values.

Both methods involve checking the state of an array of values, with 'isFull' checking if all elements are non-null and 'build' using this check to determine if the deferred values are fully collected.
